title: Kishida Kyoudan & the Akeboshi Rockets partial discography 2
description:
So I might be a little late to the party, but Kishida Kyoudan & the Akeboshi Rockets is one of my favorite doujin bands.

I found that finding downloads of them is a real pain, so I searched the web for HiDef files of them and this is what I found. Three complete albums and pieces of all the rest of the albums except two, Akeboshi rocket and Hoshizora logic. The complete albums I have here are Gensou Jihen, Literal World and Popsense.

and considering this torrent is to save people trouble, Although it's also for my reference in case I complete it, here's a listed complete discography:
